© A. Gómez Pérez, M.C. Suarez de Figueroa, B. Villazón,  E.Montiel, G. Aguado, M. Espinoza
30
Ontological Engineering
Planning and scheduling the ontology 
development
In our team, we want to build an ontology about the 
human resources management domain. The ontology 
should include information about occupations and 
activity sectors, data must be kept in the original 
DBs, and we want to have the ontology in several 
natural languages.
